QuestData.Title: Same as the Old Boss
QuestData.Description:
The Worldbreaker dragonkin are a trusting lot. We have followed many different leaders over the years, believing that each will lead us to the Hour of Twilight and the return of Deathwing.
However, Deathwing has not returned, and still there is no Twilight.
It is time for a new leader. You can help bring about the change.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The latest in a long procession of leaders.
